pr_title: [Exam] Individual working time for student exams

timeline.message: Change ArtemisDurationFromSecondsPipe output format to mm:ss
Change format of workingTimeForm to mm:ss
Implement client side of update working time
Change button title from generate to save
Add server route for updating the working time
Add test case for new server route
Also preserve exam sessions on working time update

Revert "Also preserve exam sessions on working time update"

This reverts commit dade5729c09439ce9d97244cbf8a4e7cb558bd61.

timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -89,6 +89,32 @@ public StudentExamResource(ExamAccessService examAccessService, StudentExamServi
         return courseAndExamAccessFailure.orElseGet(() -> ResponseEntity.ok(studentExamService.findAllByExamId(examId)));
     }
 
+    /**
+     * PATCH /courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/studentExams/{studentExamId}/workingTime : Update the working time of the student exam
+     *
+     * @param courseId      the course to which the student exams belong to
+     * @param examId        the exam to which the student exams belong to
+     * @param studentExamId the id of the student exam to find
+     * @param workingTime   the new working time

-     * @param workingTime   the new working time
+     * @param workingTime   the new working time in seconds
      * @return the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with the updated student exam as body

     @PatchMapping("/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/studentExams/{studentExamId}/workingTime")
